original_title: いいなり公然わいせつ 星野ナミ
overview: Nami, an office lady, was seized by a certain weakness from her boss and could not go against it at all. She used a remote rotor in the company and convenience stores and forced exposure play so that other colleagues would not find out. Her actions were discovered by her co-workers, and her situation worsened. A full-fledged drama about a woman who feels humiliation and shame but can't help but fall.
title: Obedient Public Indecency Nami Hoshino
